properties.Name: CashFlowStatementPreparationMethod
properties.Description:
There are two methods for preparing the cash flow statement.

(1)  Direct Method = Summarize debits and credits to the Cash account directly  

(2)  Indirect Method = analyzing changes during the year in balance sheet items and analyzing the numbers on the income statement for the year.

Columns.Name: CashFlowStatementPreparationMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Cash Flow Statement Preparation Method.

Columns.Name: CashFlowStatementPreparationMethodName
Columns.Description: The name of a Cash Flow Statement Preparation Method.

Columns.Name: CashFlowStatementPreparationMethodDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Cash Flow Statement Preparation Method.
